page.title: 12 Mistley Railway Bridge
page.content: During 1984 and 1985 British Rail have re-built Mistley bridge so we can have new high speed electric {trains}and improve rail{transport}to Harwich. When the bridge was re-built first the draughtsman drew the plans and showed the manager. Then they had to drill holes two feet deep along the middle of the old bridge and knock down half and leave the other half for people to cross. They re-built this half then they knocked down the other half and re-built that. After this they had to tarmac the road and re-build the pavement and put pointed brick on the walls so people dont walk on them. The bridge altogether took one year to re-build and{British Rail}hope we will have{electric trains}in 1986.
